stories.original_headline: We are living in a golden age of species discovery
stories.original_summary: The search for life on Earth is speeding up, not slowing down. stories.fantasy_headline: Royal Scribes Uncover Thousands of New Creatures!
stories.fantasy_story: Royal Scribes and Naturalist Wizards are recording more new creatures than ever before! Each year, over sixteen thousand never-before-seen animals, plants, and fungi are added to the Grand Bestiary. This reveals a magical richness across the Known Realms, showing much life still waits to be found.

stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Scholars Unlock Deep Magic's Energy Secrets!
stories.fantasy_story: Long ago, Ancient Sorcerer Rumford proved heat was not a spirit, but energy from motion. Now, Arcane Scholars at the Grand Academy have found how these fundamental rules of energy apply even in the deepest, most intricate parts of magic. This breakthrough could transform how we understand all enchantment.

stories.original_summary: It's a good thing that we already know a second season of Pluribus is on the way. stories.fantasy_headline: The Grand Saga of Pluribus Ends, But More Tales Await!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Bardic Guild's enchanted scrying pools just finished showing the first part of the grand saga of Pluribus. This tale of far-off lands and wondrous artifacts left many cliffhangers. Thankfully, the bards have announced more chapters are being prepared for next year!
